game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost city.
game.description: A long-abandoned city deep in the jungle is said to hold ancient treasures and powerful relics. Retrieving these artifacts will grant you immense power and wealth.

task.objective: Ride to the lost city and meet with the leader of the jungle tribe.
task.description: You must make your way through the dense jungle and reach the lost city, where you will meet with the leader of the tribe. He will provide you with information on how to proceed.

task.objective: Raid the lost city's temple and retrieve the artifact from the inner sanctum.
task.description: You must infiltrate the temple and navigate its treacherous traps to reach the inner sanctum, where the ancient artifact is said to reside.
